system.description: You have learned the secret speech of a particular type of animal, and may communicate with such using social skills like Persuasion, Deception, Intimidation, and Insight. In addition, you may replicate the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.1laktjzxk5nh1x1r]{Animal Friendship} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.mjrci30v32fs6hwc]{Animal Messenger} spells by expending a hit die.
